name: whiteboard-report-usage
title: Export a csv report on all Whiteboards
shortDescription: Export a report on all Whiteboard owners and it's usage.
longDescription: This script allow us to export a list of all Whiteboards created in our tenant and it's owner.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Export a csv report on all Whiteboards
